mapper.select: SELECT u2.USER_NO, u2.USER_ID, u2.USER_NAME, u2.USER_NIC, u2.USER_EMAIL, u2.USER_PROFILE, a.USER_SCORE FROM USERS u2,(SELECT u.USER_NO, NVL(AVG(e.EVAL_SCORE),0) USER_SCORE FROM USERS u,EVAL e WHERE u.USER_NO IN (SELECT re_user_no user_no FROM ADDRESS a WHERE AGREE_CHK = 1 AND USER_NO = #{user_no} UNION SELECT user_no user_no FROM ADDRESS a WHERE AGREE_CHK = 1 AND RE_USER_NO = #{user_no}) AND u.USER_NO = e.PUSER(+) GROUP BY u.USER_NO) a WHERE u2.USER_NO = a.USER_NO AND u2.USER_DELETE_CHK = 0

SELECT u2.USER_NO, u2.USER_ID, u2.USER_NAME, u2.USER_NIC, u2.USER_EMAIL, u2.USER_PROFILE, a.USER_SCORE FROM USERS u2,(SELECT u.USER_NO, NVL(AVG(e.EVAL_SCORE),0) USER_SCORE FROM USERS u,EVAL e WHERE u.USER_NO IN (SELECT re_user_no user_no FROM ADDRESS a WHERE AGREE_CHK = 1 AND USER_NO = #{user_no} UNION SELECT user_no user_no FROM ADDRESS a WHERE AGREE_CHK = 1 AND RE_USER_NO = #{user_no}) AND u.USER_NO = e.PUSER(+) GROUP BY u.USER_NO) a WHERE u2.USER_NO = a.USER_NO AND u2.USER_DELETE_CHK = 0 AND u2.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{user_name} || '%'

SELECT u.USER_NO, u.USER_ID, u.USER_NAME, u.USER_NIC, u.USER_EMAIL, u.USER_PROFILE FROM USERS u WHERE u.USER_NO IN (SELECT USER_NO FROM USER_TASK_MANY WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{project_no} AND TASK_NO = #{task_no}) AND u.USER_DELETE_CHK = 0 ORDER BY USER_NAME

SELECT u.USER_NO, u.USER_ID, u.USER_NAME, u.USER_NIC, u.USER_EMAIL, u.USER_PROFILE FROM USERS u WHERE u.USER_NO IN (SELECT USER_NO FROM USER_PROJECT_MANY WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{project_no}) AND u.USER_DELETE_CHK = 0 ORDER BY USER_NAME

SELECT u2.USER_NO, u2.USER_ID, u2.USER_NAME, u2.USER_NIC, u2.USER_EMAIL, u2.USER_PROFILE, a.USER_SCORE FROM USERS u2,(SELECT u.USER_NO, NVL(AVG(e.EVAL_SCORE),0) USER_SCORE FROM USERS u,EVAL e WHERE u.USER_NO IN (SELECT re_user_no user_no FROM ADDRESS a WHERE AGREE_CHK = 1 AND USER_NO = #{user_no} UNION SELECT user_no user_no FROM ADDRESS a WHERE AGREE_CHK = 1 AND RE_USER_NO = #{user_no}) AND u.USER_NO = e.PUSER(+) GROUP BY u.USER_NO) a WHERE u2.USER_NO = a.USER_NO AND u2.USER_DELETE_CHK = 0 AND u2.USER_NO NOT IN ( SELECT USER_NO FROM USER_PROJECT_MANY WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{project_no} )
AND u2.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{user_name} || '%'

SELECT u.*, upm2.IS_USER_IN_TASK FROM USERS u , (SELECT upm.PROJECT_NO , upm.USER_NO, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM USER_TASK_MANY utm WHERE utm.PROJECT_NO = #{project_no} AND utm.TASK_NO = #{task_no} AND upm.USER_NO = utm.USER_NO) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_USER_IN_TASK FROM USER_PROJECT_MANY upm WHERE upm.PROJECT_NO = #{project_no}) upm2 WHERE u.USER_NO = upm2.USER_NO
